references.paper_title: Lamda: Language models for dialog applications
references.reason: This paper is foundational for large language models and their application in dialog systems, a relevant area for the current paper's song generation system.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Llama, a significant language model impacting many fields, highlighting the advancement and impact of large language models on the current paper's work.

The GPT-4 technical report details a highly influential language model, showcasing the state-of-the-art in large language models and providing a benchmark for related models in the song generation context.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates using transformers for high-resolution image synthesis, which provides a relevant technical comparison to the authors’ use of transformers for high-quality song audio generation.

references.paper_title: Scaling autoregressive models for content-rich text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper focuses on scaling autoregressive models for text-to-image generation, relevant to the current work’s approach of utilizing large models for song generation, which is analogous to generating images from text descriptions.
